question.title: 9. Palindrome Number
question.description: Given an integer x, return true if x is a palindrome, and false otherwise.
question.handlerFunction: e=>{try{let t=[121,-121,10,1221],r=[!0,!1,!1,!0];for(let n=0;n<t.length;n++){let i=e(t[n]);a().strictEqual(i,r[n])}return!0}catch(e){throw console.log("isPalindrome handler function error"),Error(e)}}
